page.title: Apple Time Capsule A1254 (500 GB, MB276LL-A)

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F5281 (Orion) @500Mhz *Memory: 128MB DDR2 *Storage: 16MB SPI NOR, 500MB SATA *Network: 4x GbE *Wifi: 802.11 abgn *USB: 1x USB 2.0
[[Category:English Documentation]]
